script.name: plugin.LI.FDN.Move.Ware
script.description: FDNv8 - Handles the user inputs for moving wares

line.comment: * this script handles the user inputs for moving wares
* Fetch values saved in the AL Plugin global variable:
* fetch ware details from the source
* calculate the avialable physical, virtual and total

line.var: $source + ' has no free ' + $ware + ' - exit move ware'

line.comment: * USER SELECT - player owned ship or station
* check that destination can accept ware
* catch if source and destination is the same and exit

line.var: 'Selected: ' + $destination + ' is same as source - exit move ware'

line.comment: * USER INPUT - amount of ware to move
* if not a valid amount exit
* if amount greater than current stock
* checks if the destination can hold the ware

sval.val: FDNv8 - Handles the user inputs for moving wares
is same as source - exit move ware
this script handles the user inputs for moving wares
Fetch values saved in the AL Plugin global variable
fetch ware details from the source
calculate the avialable physical, virtual and total
USER SELECT - player owned ship or station
check that destination can accept ware
catch if source and destination is the same and exit
USER INPUT - amount of ware to move
if not a valid amount exit
if amount greater than current stock
checks if the destination can hold the ware
